body.p: Counting the number of keys in your public keybox (pubring.kbx), the format which has superseded the old keyring format (pubring.gpg and secring.gpg), or the number of secret keys is a very simple task.

p.codeblock:
import gpg
c = gpg.Context() seckeys = c.keylist(pattern=None, secret=True) pubkeys = c.keylist(pattern=None, secret=False)
seclist = list(seckeys) secnum = len(seclist)
publist = list(pubkeys) pubnum = len(publist)
print(""" Number of secret keys: {0} Number of public keys: {1} """.format(secnum, pubnum))
